reviews.text: Stayed for 5 nights on holiday in Toronto. Staff were not especially friendly at check in, but warmed up as the stay went on thankfully. Actually they turned out to be some of the politer people we met in Toronto so I am not complaining.
reviews.title: OK Hotel
A Suite Time!
reviews.text: Room was modern & clean as you would expect. Lifts from the 10th floor could be annoying slow at peak times (i.e. stopping every floor).
The restaurant/breakfast room is drab and uninspiring, with poor natural light. I had breakfast there once and did not return.
reviews.title: Our favorite hotel in Toronto
Most enjoyable stay
reviews.text: The fitness room is well equipped, but the pool is on the small side.
